name: mangrove-liquidity-bridge
description: Liquidity Bridge from DexLogic to Mangrovian order-book

scripts.anvil: npm config set script-shell "/bin/bash"; source .env; anvil -f=$RPC_URL
scripts.ethernal-reset: npm config set script-shell "/bin/bash"; source .env; node node_modules/ethernal/bin/index.js reset mumbai-anvil
scripts.ethernal-start: npm config set script-shell "/bin/bash"; source .env; node node_modules/ethernal/bin/index.js listen

author: Guillaume Garchery
